summary: A standalone and simple Follower Mod
descriptionHtml:
This follower is standalone and based on my orc preset - Grinteeth

[b]Location: [/b]

Found in the Longhouse of Dushnikh Yal (console command "coc dushnikhyalexterior01" to teleport to the place)


[b]Combat:[/b]

- loves two handed weapons, but can dual wield aswell, will rarely use a bow
- won't use shouts, magic and staves
- comes with no armor and weapon (just miner's clothes so he isn't naked)
- Lightfoot perk, some basic perks that shouldn't be too OP, if it is, please let me know!
- levels with you
- essential, unique


[b]Misc.:[/b]

- can be married
- can be a steward (he should meet the requirements because of voicetype and being a follower, I can be wrong)
- voice is MaleEvenToned
- minor mouth clipping while talking animations, I couldn't fix completely :(


[b]Armors I used for the screenshots:

[/b]Skimpy Orcish Armor (VectorPlexus)
Light Daedric Armor (RefurbMadness)


I wish you good hunting with him!



[b]Credits [/b]

author: Thrwomp
